title: RIOT can you give me free 12rp?
body:
i have 628 RP miss calculated thought i would have just enough to buy the "his royal crabness ward" and i heard that sometimes they give small amounts of RP if your short cause they are bros is this true can i get 12 RP? 

TempnameB388

replies.body:
Hey there,

Your best bet here would be to [contact the awesome team over at Player Support](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/requests/new) and provide them with some sort of offering.

I hear they enjoy some good MS paint artwork (League of legends related).
